uvme_analysis_input

Keep checking fifo, if the fifo is not empty will send the transaction to next analysis's input.

this_output_type neighbour_output

Used to connect uvme_transaction_input to a uvme_transaction_output.  Use egrep "TRACE::CONNECT" log to get link information

set_label
function void set_label(
input int unsigned label
)

Used for input group, each group has a uniq index called label, Use this function to set the label.  this function should be used when using `uvme_analysis_input_imp_with_label_decl
